alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McLean; Mercer; Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:31PM CDT until July 02 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WARD...NORTHEASTERN DUNN... NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN...SOUTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL AND NORTHWESTERN MERCER COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT/730 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plaza to 12 miles north of Indian Hills Recreation Area to 4 miles northeast of Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Makoti around 840 PM CDT. Indian Hills Recreation Area around 845 PM CDT. Ryder and Roseglen around 850 PM CDT. Douglas around 905 PM CDT. Beulah Bay Recreation Area around 915 PM CDT. Hazen Bay Recreation Area around 920 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Skunk Creek Bay Recreation Area, White Shield, Twin Buttes, Deep Water Creek Recreation Area, Raub, Dakota Waters Recreation Area and Emmet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
